decision_conditions: The details received pursuant to condition 5 (Landscaping) are considered insufficient. The details of the planting is poor and the proposal fails provide any details of the hard landscaping. In its current form, it is not considered that sufficient information has been received to demonstrate that the proposal would not impact on the visual amenities of the locality. As such the scheme fails to comply with Policies DMHB 11 and DMHB 14 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part - Development Management Policies (2020).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to conditions 6 (Method Statement) and 7 (Landscaping) of planning permission Ref: 22474/APP/2018/215 dated 13/03/2018 (Two-storey side extension and single-storey rear extension to allow for subdivision of dwelling into 2 x 3-bed dwelling houses with associated parking and amenity space and extension to vehicular crossover to front)
